properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the MojikumiUiPreference (a Document or Application).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: If true, uses half-width spacing for all characters.
properties.name: lineEndAllOneHalfEm

properties.description: If true, indents lines one space and uses line end uke one half space.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndUkeOneHalfEm

properties.description: If true, indents lines one full or half space and uses line end uke one half space.
properties.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndUkeOneHalfEm

properties.description: If true, Uses full-witdh spacing for all characters except the last character in the line, which uses either full- or half-width spacing.
properties.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndAllOneEm

properties.description: If true, indents lines one full space and uses full-width spacing for all characters.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllOneEm

properties.description: If true, indents lines one full space and uses no float for all characters.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllNoFloat

properties.description: If true, indents lines one full space and uses line end uke no float.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndUkeNoFloat

properties.description: If true, indents lines one half space or one full space and uses line end uke no float.
properties.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndUkeNoFloat

properties.description: If true, indents lines one full space and uses half-width spacing for all characters.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllOneHalfEm

properties.description: If true, uses full-width spacing for all characters.
properties.name: lineEndAllOneEm

properties.description: If true, uses line end uke no float.
properties.name: lineEndUkeNoFloat

properties.description: If true, indents lines one or one-half space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.
properties.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndPeriodOneEm

properties.description: If true, indents lines one space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.
properties.name: oneEmIndentLineEndPeriodOneEm

properties.description: If true, uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.
properties.name: lineEndPeriodOneEm

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MojikumiUiPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
